name: Page Reloader
description:
Reloads the page if HTTP status is any of:
	 	408 (Request Timeout),
		502 (Bad Gateway),
		503 (Service Unavailable),
		504 (Gateway Timeout),
		522 (Connection timeout),
		524 (Network timeout - CDN),
		598 (Network timeout - MS CDN),
		599 (Network timeout - MS CDN) or socket error
